prompt.name: p101
prompt.text: Inequality solver

prompt.name: p102
prompt.text: Movable line graph

prompt.name: p103
prompt.text: Compound inequality

prompt.name: p104
prompt.text: Tool Tip

prompt.name: p105
prompt.text: Read the tool tips carefully.

prompt.name: p106
prompt.text: Sorry. This operation cannot be used more than 5 times.

prompt.name: p107
prompt.text: First use add/subtract !!

prompt.name: p108
prompt.text: Please reduce the equation and isolate x terms first.

prompt.name: p109
prompt.text: Please enter the values considering the previous statement.

prompt.name: p110
prompt.text: Multiply such that the denominator is 1.

prompt.name: p111
prompt.text: Please use tool tips, Isolate x.

prompt.name: p112
prompt.text: Divide by a value that eliminates the denominator or x.

prompt.name: p113
prompt.text: Please use tool tips, Isolate x.

prompt.name: p114
prompt.text: Please enter positive values only.

prompt.name: p115
prompt.text: Well Done! You've obtained the solution of the given inequality.

prompt.name: p116
prompt.text: Eliminate the fraction first.

prompt.name: p117
prompt.text: Use multiplication first.

prompt.name: p118
prompt.text: Use division to eliminate co-efficient of x.

prompt.name: p119
prompt.text: The solution is all real numbers #ansString1# #point1#

prompt.name: p120
prompt.text: and #ansString2# #point2#

prompt.name: p121
prompt.text: greater than

prompt.name: p122
prompt.text: less than

prompt.name: p123
prompt.text: greater than or equal to

prompt.name: p124
prompt.text: less than or equal to

prompt.name: p125
prompt.text: The solution is the real number #point1#

prompt.name: p126
prompt.text: No solution exists between the two inequalities

prompt.name: p127
prompt.text: or #ansString2# #point2#

prompt.name: p128
prompt.text: 1. Enter only numeric values in the blank. (e.g. -1, -2, 0, 1, 2 etc.)

prompt.name: p129
prompt.text: 2. Hit enter after entering a value in the blank.

prompt.name: p130
prompt.text: 3. Isolate the variable on the left side of the inequality sign.

prompt.name: p131
prompt.text:
4. Isolating means coefficient of x is 1.
Non-isolated form: 2x + 4 > 12; Isolated form: x > 4.

prompt.name: p132
prompt.text: 5. When x is present on both sides of the equation, (e.g. 2x + 3 > 1 + x) use Group Like Terms.

prompt.name: p133
prompt.text: 1. Choose appropriate sign from the sign list.

prompt.name: p134
prompt.text: 2. Move the slider and observe the line graph of a particular inequality.

prompt.name: p135
prompt.text: 3. Empty circle on a number in a line graph means that number is not included.

prompt.name: p136
prompt.text: 4. Filled circle signifies that number in included in the inequality set.

prompt.name: p137
prompt.text: 1. Choose appropriate sign and move the slider to set both the inequalities.

prompt.name: p138
prompt.text: 2. Choose between AND and OR operations.

prompt.name: p139
prompt.text: 3. Line at the bottom (in green) shows solution set of both the inequalities.

prompt.name: p140
prompt.text: 4. Vertical line helps you visualize all the three lines together.

prompt.name: p141
prompt.text: Tool Tips
